description: EZ Calc is a Tip Calculator, a Unit Converter and a Calculator in one. The main feature is the Tip Calculator, which automatically calculates the "split" amount depending on the number of people "splitting" the bill, the  user just needs to enter the total amount (with tax included) in the Bill field by using the on-screen keypad. The Unit Converter allows the user to convert popular units of measure (Distance/Area/Weight/Volume/Speed/Temperature). And the Calculator feature is pretty straightforward and the numbers are easily readable. This app is very easy to use and users will appreciate the simplicity.
